void Document::append ( Paragraph &  p,
bool  owned 
)

append paragraph to the document

append add content to the document.

Parameters:
p paragraph: the paragraph to add to the document
owned boolean: if true, the paragraph is add to the document as internal resource, otherwise, as external resource
